name: Sixfive
description:
The residents of the fifth and sixth dimensions have never had particularly positive opinions of each other. However, strange things have begun to occur in dimension six, and the queen suspects foul play. Nothing the lowly Prince Lippo can't handle... right?

Fight against the evil dwellers of dimension five with your royal stash of playing cards in this short and simple turn-based RPG. Swap dimensions mid-battle and draw and play cards to strike down your opponents.

This game is woefully unbalanced and unpolished, but hopefully you'll still have a bit of fun with it.

The music of this game was made by the wonderful Rhys Weathers. Check him out here!

Developed in Godot 3.1 Mono in C#. Made for Godot Wild Jam #11. Source code available here. (It's not pretty. I apologize profusely.)
